task_descriptions:
Come up with your own scenario!

About you:
- Your name: `CustomerName@restaurant`
- Your friend (?) `HostName@schedule`'s party takes place at `PartyName@schedule`
- Today is `Day@schedule` the `Date@plane` of June, `Time@restaurant`

 The AI Assistant can handle:
- Restaurant search and reservation
- Party RSVP messages
- Trivia game
linear_guide: Use your imagination to generate a conversation about the topics 'Restaurant' and 'Party RSVP' (in any order), as shown on the left. You may also play up to two rounds of trivia with the assistant - just don't start with that.
You may attempt to do some smalltalk with the AI Assistant at any time.
If you haven't yet, it's time to change topic. You can also go back and forth between topics.
If it makes sense, use some negations ('I don't want', or 'anything but ...', etc.)
Keep going until you've covered all the topics (restaurant and party RSVP). The conversation should continue at least until the last instruction is given.
If you like, you can ask for a game of trivia at any point. But don't play more than two rounds.
Keep going :) - don't forget some smalltalk. Perhaps say something related to the first topic you talked about.
Almost there. A few more turns.
Ok, once you've touched on all the topics ('restaurant' and 'party') and engaged in some smalltalk, you can bring the conversation to a natural close.
